p: All the herbs were taken to the laboratory and air-dried at a temperature range between 20 - 25 °C, for 48 hours (additional airflow was not used). The equilibrium moisture content, as percent moisture, for each of the 3 herbs after drying under the conditions referenced here were: 7.72 ± 0.04% for A. graveolens, 4.25 ± 0.02% for T. vulgaris and 6.59 ± 0.03% for C. sativum.
